billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Provides that the governor may within 180 days of taking office, remove members of boards of public authorities and fill vacancies created with his or her appointees
summary: Provides that the governor may, within 180 days of taking office, remove members of boards of public authorities and fill vacancies created with his or her appointees.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the terms of members appointed by the governor to boards of public authorities
